name: ocl-js
description: Object Constraint Language parser written in JavaScript.

scripts.test: npm run generate:parser &&  node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.build: npm run generate:parser && npm run build:lib && npm run build:min && npm run build:max
scripts.build:examples: npm run build && babel examples/examples.js -o examples/examples.min.js && webpack examples/examples.min.js examples/examples.min.js
